name: Project.Protonic
description:
Hello there, this is a small prototype of a Mario 64 type game, but with an even more retro style.

I posted this to get opinions on the art and concept (because the levels and dialogue will be much better) and this is just a toy box to try (aside from the end game, it will have more mechanics).

Controls:   ARROWS (cross space and matter at a speed of 4 fps)   CTRL (interact/attack).

Plot: You are a robot. No diskettes.

Mission: You are a robot. Grab diskettes.

REAL Mission: Talk to katt.

Credits: Me.

Enjoy it. :)
